snippet: In spite of the talk in Allied capitals about intensifying the war, the Allied Governments are not yet ready to launch air attacks and military offensives on a large scale. They still believe that they can win the war without slaughter....
lead_paragraph: In spite of the talk in Allied capitals about intensifying the war, the Allied Governments are not yet ready to launch air attacks and military offensives on a large scale. They still believe that they can win the war without slaughter.
